keyFacts: The document summarizes account activity for Amanda Kirby Balsam's business checking account at Deutsche Bank for July 2014.
The beginning balance as of July 1, 2014, was $139,471.98.
The ending balance as of July 31, 2014, was also $139,471.98, indicating no activity during the month.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF (non-sufficient funds) fees reported for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
